home.title: EMECE YAZILIM
home.subtitle: EDUCATION AND CONSULTANCY
home.description: Established in 2024 with the support of Istanbul Medeniyet University Technopark, we aim to produce technological knowledge, develop innovations, improve quality, efficiency, and cost elements, commercialize knowledge, and offer national and international cooperation projects and services by fostering University-Industry collaboration.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description1: We offer technology consulting and web applications with innovative and user-friendly mobile solutions designed specifically for you and your company, which will increase your competitive strength in your sector day by day.
aboutUs.description2: In the solutions and applications we offer, we evaluate your business model, brand vision, target audience or user characteristics, and your preferences together. We aim to help you reach the ideal application as a result of these multi-variable development processes.
aboutUs.ourApproachDesc: In all the services we provide, we take into account your brand values, brand goals, user characteristics, and special requests.
aboutUs.ourCommitmentDesc: We enable you to reach ideal and sustainable applications that will ensure success at every stage.
aboutUs.strategicDevelopmentDesc: For the best results, we evaluate feedback on software or applications developed in accordance with the business plan and help you plan new strategies for the future.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer professional solutions that will take your business a step forward in the digital world.
services.webMobileDesc: We carry out software and coding work that will bring your imagined business ideas to the digital world in line with your needs.
services.trainingsDesc: Customized trainings given by industry-leading instructors. Special consultancy services for companies' needs and ISO Management Systems.
services.corporateSolutionsDesc: We strive to be your strongest solution partner in your digital transformation journey. While offering corporate solutions, we consider both internal operations and stakeholder needs.
services.consultancyDesc: Presidency's Digital Transformation Office - Information and Communication Security Regulation Compliance Project. Artificial Intelligence Supported Risk Analysis and Management.
